mapper.sql: SELECT u.id,u.username,u.realname,u.email,u.password,u.create_time,u.modify_time, r.id AS role_id, r.name AS role_name FROM user u JOIN role r ON u.role_id = r.id
mapper.select: WHERE u.delete_flag = '0' AND u.id = #{id} FOR UPDATE
WHERE u.delete_flag = '0' AND u.username = #{username} FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, create_time, modify_time, email, realname, role_id) VALUE (#{username}, #{password}, NOW(), NOW(), #{email}, #{realname}, #{roleId})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user u
JOIN role r ON u.role_id = r.id
WHERE delete_flag = '0'
AND r.id = #{roleId}
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND u.realname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{realname}, '%')
AND u.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
